title: Letterhead, "Pizzagalli Terrazzo Tuile & Marbre Inc."
medium: Embossed lettering, lithograph on white wove paper
markings:
3 seals are printed vertically in light green towards bottom left: 
The Montreal Consruction Association's seal consists of a large C surrounding 3 small A's. 
the Seal of The National Terrazzo and Mosaic Association consists of text encircling a person at a worktable. 
The seal of the Terrazzo, Tile, and Marble Association of Canada is 3 three ovals representing the textures of the materials.
inscribed: Printed in white ink, upper center: P T. Printed in red ink, upper center: izzagalli errazzo Tuile & Marbre Inc./Manufacturiers Enterpreneurs Importateurs/105 West, Rue Jean-Talon Montreal 10 Quebec 179-6361. Printed in light green ink, lower margin: Contrats subordonnes aux greves et evenements imprevisbles. Cotations sujettes a proupte acceptation.
description:
Letterhead with 5 lines of red text and a checkerboard pattern in shades of green and red. 
1st line: Light red square. 2nd line: Dark green square to the left of square above. 4th line: a light green square followed by a dark green square.

tombstone.epitaph: Letterhead, "Pizzagalli Terrazzo Tuile & Marbre Inc.".Embossed lettering, lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1997-131-5.
